name.description: Specifies the name of the DevSpace Controller. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group under which the DevSpace Controller resource has to be created. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

location.description: Specifies the supported location where the DevSpace Controller should exist. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

sku_name.description: Specifies the SKU Name for this DevSpace Controller. Possible values are `S1`.

target_container_host_resource_id.description: The resource id of Azure Kubernetes Service cluster. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

target_container_host_credentials_base64.description: Base64 encoding of `kube_config_raw` of Azure Kubernetes Service cluster. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

tags.description: A mapping of tags to assign to the resource.

id.description: The ID of the DevSpace Controller.

data_plane_fqdn.description: DNS name for accessing DataPlane services.

host_suffix.description: The host suffix for the DevSpace Controller.

create.description: Used when creating the DevSpace Controller.

update.description: Used when updating the DevSpace Controller.

read.description: Used when retrieving the DevSpace Controller.

delete.description: Used when deleting the DevSpace Controller.
